name: R.I.P: Rest in Plants
description:
Play as a keeper to a haunted graveyard; plant flowers for those who are departed and avoid those crazy critters.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Can be played in browser, on a Game Boy (.gb), or on an Analogue Pocket (.pocket).

KeyActionWASD / Arrow Keys
MovementJ, Z (A Button on Game Boy)
Plant Flower

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 2 days for GB Jam 10 using GB Studio using assets I created

Didn't have enough time to add sound :(
